channel.title: Phantom
channel.description:
Base: [i]rs2e[/i] Why rs2e?: [i]rs2e uses 3 threads for everything, unlike 1 thread per client like the winterLove counterpart. rs2e is a bit more advanced than wL, making it useful for non-idiots. There's not a lot in it, making it better. Not a lot of tutorials for it that I've seen, so everything will be made, created, and coded by me.[/i]
What have I made/done so far? [i]The following is not everything. It's just some. Yes this is in order.[/i]
[ul][li]NPC Aggression. Certain NPCs will be aggressive, auto attack and walk up to you.[/li] [li]Auto retaliation with action buttons.[/li] [li]Converted rs2e from 2.7 to 3.1 (didnt bother adding everything I had in 2.7 to 3.1.. easier just to convert. :))[/li] [li]Combat: Found good xp to use: Stab/slash/def/etc: 60 skill, 25 hp. Controlled: 20 atk/str/def, 15 hp.[/li] [li]Range: Found good xp to use: Accurate/etc: 75 range, 25 hp. Longrange (defence): 20 Range, 20 Def, 15 HP.[/li] [li]Removed Serializable loading and saving. It sucks and randomly resets you.[/li] [li]Created saving and loading to and from a MySQL database, 100%. [/li][/ul]
It's not much [i]yet[/i], but when you think about it, do you think a "coder" could do what I have already done, without following a c|p tutorial?
What will the system behind Phantom be? [i]This server will be virtually commandless and will utilize most of the major cities in the RS map, not a select area loaded with 100's of NPCs. There will be a stable economy; and for example, the Abyssal Whip will be worth something not 2gp. There will be NO emote teleports. Emotes = emotes. Teleports = teleports.[/i]
I will attempt to convert rs2e to 474 next week. If I can convert all the packets fine I will convert phantom, and use a 474 client. Why? Well it's obvious; near all current rs2 areas, real gfx/emotes, and GS/Skill capes without hard coding them. If I can't convert rs2e fine? I will just have GodSwords and probably Skill capes hardcoded to a 317 refactored.
This will [u]not be released upon completion[/u], I plan to have a beta date of July 30th, and the server will be stable enough for 24/7, which I will be hosting it.
Post your thoughts and suggestions!

item.title: Phantom
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

[quote=“Scarecrows, post:10, topic:218850”][quote author=Hidendra link=topic=287557.msg2325860#msg2325860 date=1215683364]
What will the system behind Phantom be? This server will be virtually commandless and will utilize most of the major cities in the RS map, not a select area loaded with 100’s of NPCs. There will be a stable economy; and for example, the Abyssal Whip will be worth something not 2gp. There will be NO emote teleports. Emotes = emotes. Teleports = teleports.
[/quote]

Finally someone else is doing this…

The current state of what private servers are like is completely ridiculous, just doing that increases the state and overall fun of gameplay a lot…[/quote]
That is one of the reasons I started this project. That makes it attract the more serious players in a sense because some/most fuck ups that hang around here won’t play a server if it doesn’t have say spawning, or silab client, or starter commands, or even easy mod/admin etc.

Read full topic

What will the system behind Phantom be? This server will be virtually commandless and will utilize most of the major cities in the RS map, not a select area loaded with 100’s of NPCs. There will be a stable economy; and for example, the Abyssal Whip will be worth something not 2gp. There will be NO emote teleports. Emotes = emotes. Teleports = teleports.

The current state of what private servers are like is completely ridiculous, just doing that increases the state and overall fun of gameplay a lot…

item.title: Phantom
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

Base: rs2e
Why rs2e?: rs2e uses 3 threads for everything, unlike 1 thread per client like the winterLove counterpart. rs2e is a bit more advanced than wL, making it useful for non-idiots. There’s not a lot in it, making it better. Not a lot of tutorials for it that I’ve seen, so everything will be made, created, and coded by me.

What have I made/done so far? The following is not everything. It’s just some. Yes this is in order.

[ul][li]NPC Aggression. Certain NPCs will be aggressive, auto attack and walk up to you.[/li]
[li]Auto retaliation with action buttons.[/li]
[li]Converted rs2e from 2.7 to 3.1 (didnt bother adding everything I had in 2.7 to 3.1… easier just to convert. :))[/li]
[li]Combat: Found good xp to use: Stab/slash/def/etc: 60 skill, 25 hp. Controlled: 20 atk/str/def, 15 hp.[/li]
[li]Range: Found good xp to use: Accurate/etc: 75 range, 25 hp. Longrange (defence): 20 Range, 20 Def, 15 HP.[/li]
[li]Removed Serializable loading and saving. It sucks and randomly resets you.[/li]
[li]Created saving and loading to and from a MySQL database, 100%. [/li][/ul]

It’s not much yet, but when you think about it, do you think a “coder” could do what I have already done, without following a c|p tutorial?

What will the system behind Phantom be? This server will be virtually commandless and will utilize most of the major cities in the RS map, not a select area loaded with 100’s of NPCs. There will be a stable economy; and for example, the Abyssal Whip will be worth something not 2gp. There will be NO emote teleports. Emotes = emotes. Teleports = teleports.

I will attempt to convert rs2e to 474 next week. If I can convert all the packets fine I will convert phantom, and use a 474 client. Why? Well it’s obvious; near all current rs2 areas, real gfx/emotes, and GS/Skill capes without hard coding them.
If I can’t convert rs2e fine? I will just have GodSwords and probably Skill capes hardcoded to a 317 refactored.

This will not be released upon completion, I plan to have a beta date of July 30th, and the server will be stable enough for 24/7, which I will be hosting it.

 Post your thoughts and suggestions!
